description: Sweet potato benefits both your eyes and your immune system
which is your body's protection against infections. It is also beneficial to your reproductive system as well as organs such as your heart and kidneys.
product.name: Sweet Potato

description: Indian plum, also known as jujube, is abundant in antioxidants, particularly vitamin c, which protects the body from oxidative stress and lowers the risk of chronic disorders. The high vitamin c content of jujube boosts immunity and aids in the battle against illnesses and infections.
product.name: Plum Indian (Aloo Bukhara)
